Text: Confirmation Message CEPDear Mark Taylor Thank you for choosing a Red Carnation Hotel for your up and coming stay in London Following your request we are delighted to confirm your reservation NAME Mark Taylor ARRIVAL DATE DEPARTURE DATE ROOM TYPE Every room in this stunning property is Deluxe Executive Club King Rooms boast all of the facilities of a fave star property included in the room rate mini bar laundy business facilities internet and email access all meals and telephone calls RATE GBP RATE INCLUSIONS GBP ACCOUNT DETAILS CONFIRMATION NUMBER CEP Unless otherwise stated the above rates are quoted as per room per night and are inclusive of service and exclusive of Value Added Tax at the current rate of Please be advised that the check in time in hrs on the day of arrival we regret that we are unable to guarantee check in before this time unless your reservation is preregistered and prepaid from the night prior however we are able to register your guest and store luggage until such a time as your guests room is available Similarly checkout time is at hrs on the day of departure departures after this time are subject to a supplementary charge All reservations are held for late arrival should you need to cancel the above reservation please do so by pm the day prior to day of arrival any cancellations made after this time are subject to one nights accommodation charge similarly should your guests not arrive a charge of one nights accommodation will be made We look forward to welcoming your guests to Red Carnation Hotels Please feel free to contact our reservations team directly should you have any further questions or require any further assistance Kindest Regards Reservations Office Red Carnation Hotels

Cancellation Message ZVXYTDear Linda Hayman We are sorry that you have cancelled your reservation with Red Carnation Hotels Following on from your request please be advised that we have cancelled the following reservation NAME Linda Hayman ARRIVAL DATE HOTEL NAME All Inclusive Hotel CANCELLATION REF ZVXYT I do hope that we are able to accommodate your guests in the future please do feel free to contact us for future reservations Kindest Regards Reservations Department Red Carnation Hotels
